overview: In this twisted tale of seduction and manipulation, Jessica Drake plays a spoiled rich girl who gets off on manipulating the hearts and minds of those around her. Bored and looking for new victims, she and her step-brother (Kyle Stone) decide to gamble on a little game of cat and mouse. the victim? Her ex-boyfriends virginal new girlfriend. But just when it appears that this delightful diversion is going to play itself out to its cruel end, they are unexpectedly caught and this decadently devious duo is given just what they deserve... a taste of their own medicine.
title: Cruel Seductions
